---
title: "Zoe"
---

Zoe is no stranger to the dance floor, but a recent dabbler behind the decks. She's been part of the KW music scene in a variety of ways for the last 30 years. Come see her pick some tracks, press some buttons, twiddle some knobs and encourage your booty to bounce to some bountiful international house beats.

> Currently workshopping DJ names, let her know if you've got a suggestion!
